articles.title: 5 years later: What it's like living with long COVID - Yahoo
articles.description: At a time when the world seems eager to declare the COVID-19 pandemic a closed chapter, I — along with millions of other Americans — continue to confront a...
articles.content: At a time when the world seems eager to declare the COVID-19 pandemic a closed chapter, I along with millions of other Americans continue to confront a relentless, invisible enemy that has redefined … [+5860 chars]
